Texts.Chs:
水獭般的智慧种族。
    
食性: 杂食性 
 
^orange;天赋^reset;: 
  ^green;200^reset;呼吸, +^green;70^reset;呼吸恢复速率
  抗性:  ^green;30^reset;%寒气抗性, ^green;20^reset;%火炎抗性
  免疫: 潮湿
  ^cyan;游泳加速 2^reset;

^orange;环境^reset;: 
  ^green;海洋^reset;生物群落:
    HP&能量x^green;1.2^reset;
    
^orange;武器^reset;:
  突击步枪: 伤害 x^green;1.2^reset;, +^green;1^reset;% 暴击几率,+^green;7^reset;% 暴击伤害
  阔剑: 伤害 x^green;1.2^reset;, +^green;2^reset;% 暴击几率, +^green;5^reset;% 暴击伤害
  矛: 伤害 x^green;1.2^reset;

^red;弱点^reset;: 
  抗性:  -^red;20^reset;%辐射抗性, -^red;30^reset;%电系抗性
Texts.Eng:
A sapient race of otter-like people.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  ^green;200^reset; Breath, +^green;70^reset; Breath Regen Rate
  ^green;Resist^reset;: ^green;30^reset;% Ice, ^green;20^reset;% Fire
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Wet
  ^cyan;Swim Boost 2^reset;

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  ^green;oceanic^reset; biomes: Health & Energy x^green;1.2^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Assault Rifle: Damage x^green;1.2^reset;, +^green;1^reset;% Crit Chance,+^green;7^reset;% Crit Damage
  Broadsword: Damage x^green;1.2^reset;, +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance, +^green;5^reset;% Crit Damage
  Spear: Damage x^green;1.2^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;20^reset;% Radioactive, -^red;30^reset;% Electric
